title: Public opinion on adoption rights for same-sex couples in the U.S. 2014
summary: This statistic shows the survey on Yes_should usage in the U.S. in 2014 .
According to the survey , 63 % of the respondents used an Yes_should , while 63 % did not .
2 % of respondents said they did n't No_opinion if they used Yes_should blocking software .
